description: Standard 2'-O-methyl pattern for balanced stability and cost
reference: Industry standard pattern based on Alnylam and other leading companies

2OMe.rationale: Alternating 2'-O-methyl modifications provide nuclease resistance while maintaining RISC loading
Offset pattern on passenger strand complements guide strand pattern

overhang.rationale: DNA overhangs (dTdT) are cost-effective and provide stability

notes: This pattern works well for most applications
Good balance between stability and cost
Recommended for initial in vitro studies
